snippet.title: TV host Laura Csortan attempts to sell $2k Alex Perry gown for a fraction of price on Facebook
snippet.content:
Alex Perry at the Myer fashion launch 1:15
Sydney Confidential speaks to Alex Perry ahead of his first Myer fashion show at the Spring/Summer 2015 season launch.
August 7th 2014 3 years ago /display/newscorpaustralia.com/Web/NewsNetwork/Entertainment - syndicated/
Laura Csortan.
Soraiya Fuda
Share
SHE has a rumoured net worth of more than one million dollars but it appears travel host Laura Csortan is out to make a quick buck. The 40-year-old has gone on the community Facebook page called, , in an attempt to sell a pricey, gold Alex Perry gown.
Laura's post on the community Facebook page.Source:The Daily Telegraph
Laura Csortan and baby Layla. Picture: Belinda RollandSource:Supplied Csortan, who became a member on July 19 last year just months before giving birth to her daughter Layla Rose in November, posted to the page on Friday. "Stunning gold Alex Perry gown. Never worn. Size 8. Will fit size 8 or 10," she wrote last week.
Laura Csortan.Source:News Corp Australia The purchaser of the stunning gown is in for a bargain. The Alex Perry frock, which retails for about $2000, has been uploaded for sale for just $150. The post has been since deleted. In November, Csortan shared the first picture of her newborn baby girl on Instagram.
on
Csortan set tongues wagging when she announced her pregnancy in June, saying she would be a single mum. She did not name the father and has been adamant that she is going to keep his identity under wraps.
on
Originally published as
